src:
Centrão quer deixar Eduardo “sangrando” por seis meses

06 Nov 2019, 07:20

Caciques do Centrão querem que Rodrigo Maia abra o processo contra Eduardo Bolsonaro no Conselho de Ética e deixem o filho do presidente “sangrando” no colegiado por cerca de seis meses, diz a Crusoé.
Nesse período, poderiam usar o caso para chantagear o governo.
Leia a nota completa aqui.
text:
Centerman wants to leave Eduardo "bleeding" for six months

06 Nov 2019, 07:20

Centrão chiefs want Rodrigo Maia to open the lawsuit against Eduardo Bolsonaro in the Ethics Council and leave the president's son "bleeding" in the board for about six months, says Crusoe.
During this time, they could use the case to blackmail the government.
Read the full note here.
